select t1.* , t2.user_name , t3.theme_name1 , t4.work_contents_code_name from t_manhour AS t1 inner join m_user As t2 on t2.user_no = t1.user_no inner join m_theme AS t3 on t3.theme_no = t1.theme_no inner join m_work_contents as t4 on t1.work_contents_code = t4.work_contents_code and t1.work_contents_class = t4.work_contents_class
where 1 = 1
and t1.YEAR = :Year
and t1.Month = :Month
and t1.group_code = :Group
and t1.user_no = :User

select distinct(u2.function_class ), u2.screen_url from m_user as u1 inner join m_role as u2 on u1.role_code = u2.role_code where u2.screen_url='ManhourUpdate'
and u1.user_no = :user_no

select * from m_user_screen_item as u where 1=1 and (u.screen_item ='GROUP_CODE' or u.screen_item = 'USER_NO')
and u.user_no = :user_no
order by u.screen_item

SELECT tem.DayConver FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT (cal.date) , cal.horiday , u.user_no , u.site_code , u.group_code , date_part('year', cal.date) as YearConver , date_part('month', cal.date) as MonthConver , date_part('day', cal.date) as DayConver FROM public.m_calendar as cal Join public.m_user as U ON U.site_code = cal.site_code inner join t_manhour as m on U.user_no = m.user_no ) as tem where tem.horiday = true
and tem.YearConver = :Year
and tem.MonthConver = :Month
and tem.group_code = :Group
and tem.user_no = :User

update public.m_user_screen_item as item set
screen_input = :screenInput
where 1=1
and screen_item = :screenItem
and item.user_no = :userNo
